    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run()
        Runs new server thread. Attempts to connect to the bank and provide auction house info. Begins listening for agent client connections.
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable

      • cleanUp

        public void cleanUp()

                                  int itemID)
        Attempts to send outbid notification to specified client.
        Parameters:
        clientID - Client ID to send notification to
        itemID - Item which the client was outbid on
        Returns:
